00030 /// @defgroup basicTypes Basic Types
00031 /// Most of these types can be configured at compile time.
00032 /// @{
00033 
00034 #if CP_USE_DOUBLES
00035 /// Chipmunk's floating point type.
00036 /// Can be reconfigured at compile time.
00037         typedef double cpFloat;
00038         #define cpfsqrt sqrt
00039         #define cpfsin sin
00040         #define cpfcos cos
00041         #define cpfacos acos
00042         #define cpfatan2 atan2
00043         #define cpfmod fmod
00044         #define cpfexp exp
00045         #define cpfpow pow
00046         #define cpffloor floor
00047         #define cpfceil ceil
00048 #else
00049         typedef float cpFloat;
00050         #define cpfsqrt sqrtf
00051         #define cpfsin sinf
00052         #define cpfcos cosf
00053         #define cpfacos acosf
00054         #define cpfatan2 atan2f
00055         #define cpfmod fmodf
00056         #define cpfexp expf
00057         #define cpfpow powf
00058         #define cpffloor floorf
00059         #define cpfceil ceilf
00060 #endif
00061 
00062 #ifndef INFINITY
00063         //TODO use C++ infinity
00064         #ifdef _MSC_VER
00065                 union MSVC_EVIL_FLOAT_HACK
00066                 {
00067                         unsigned __int8 Bytes[4];
00068                         float Value;
00069                 };
00070                 static union MSVC_EVIL_FLOAT_HACK INFINITY_HACK = {{0x00, 0x00, 0x80, 0x7F}};
00071                 #define INFINITY (INFINITY_HACK.Value)
00072         #endif
00073         
00074         #ifdef __GNUC__
00075                 #define INFINITY (__builtin_inf())
00076         #endif
00077         
00078         #ifndef INFINITY
00079                 #define INFINITY (1e1000)
00080         #endif
00081 #endif

00084         #define M_PI 3.14159265358979323846264338327950288
00085 #endif

00088         #define M_E 2.71828182845904523536028747135266250

00092 /// Return the max of two cpFloats.
00093 static inline cpFloat cpfmax(cpFloat a, cpFloat b)
00094 {
00095         return (a > b) ? a : b;
00096 }
00097 
00098 /// Return the min of two cpFloats.
00099 static inline cpFloat cpfmin(cpFloat a, cpFloat b)
00100 {
00101         return (a < b) ? a : b;
00102 }
00103 
00104 /// Return the absolute value of a cpFloat.
00105 static inline cpFloat cpfabs(cpFloat f)
00106 {
00107         return (f < 0) ? -f : f;
00108 }
00109 
00110 /// Clamp @c f to be between @c min and @c max.
00111 static inline cpFloat cpfclamp(cpFloat f, cpFloat min, cpFloat max)
00112 {
00113         return cpfmin(cpfmax(f, min), max);
00114 }
00115 
00116 /// Clamp @c f to be between 0 and 1.
00117 static inline cpFloat cpfclamp01(cpFloat f)
00118 {
00119         return cpfmax(0.0f, cpfmin(f, 1.0f));
00120 }
00121 
00122 
00123 
00124 /// Linearly interpolate (or extrapolate) between @c f1 and @c f2 by @c t percent.
00125 static inline cpFloat cpflerp(cpFloat f1, cpFloat f2, cpFloat t)
00126 {
00127         return f1*(1.0f - t) + f2*t;
00128 }
00129 
00130 /// Linearly interpolate from @c f1 to @c f2 by no more than @c d.
00131 static inline cpFloat cpflerpconst(cpFloat f1, cpFloat f2, cpFloat d)
00132 {
00133         return f1 + cpfclamp(f2 - f1, -d, d);
00134 }
00135 
00136 /// Hash value type.
00137 typedef uintptr_t cpHashValue;
00138 
00139 /// Chipmunk's boolean type.
00140 /// Oh C, how we love to define our own boolean types to get compiler compatibility
00141 #ifdef CP_BOOL_TYPE
00142         typedef CP_BOOL_TYPE cpBool;
00143 #else
00144         typedef int cpBool;
00145 #endif

00148 /// true value.
00149         #define cpTrue 1
00150 #endif
00151 
00152 #ifndef cpFalse
00153 /// false value.
00154         #define cpFalse 0
00155 #endif

00159 #else
00160 /// Type used for user data pointers.

00188 /// Type used for various timestamps in Chipmunk.
00189         typedef unsigned int cpTimestamp;
00190 #endif
00191 
00192 #ifndef CP_NO_GROUP
00193 /// Value for cpShape.group signifying that a shape is in no group.
00194         #define CP_NO_GROUP ((cpGroup)0)
00195 #endif
00196 
00197 #ifndef CP_ALL_LAYERS
00198 /// Value for cpShape.layers signifying that a shape is in every layer.
00199         #define CP_ALL_LAYERS (~(cpLayers)0)
00200 #endif

00203 // CGPoints are structurally the same, and allow
00204 // easy interoperability with other Cocoa libraries
00205 #ifdef CP_USE_CGPOINTS
00206         typedef CGPoint cpVect;
00207 #else
00208 /// Chipmunk's 2D vector type.
00209 /// @addtogroup cpVect
00210         typedef struct cpVect{cpFloat x,y;} cpVect;
00211 #endif
